genre_description: A high-stakes political and spy thriller set in a noir-inspired Tokyo, featuring a journalist attempting to expose a secret war plan with the help of a tactical AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Haruko Lynn
ai_characters.description: An AI providing real-time intelligence, route navigation, translation, and emotional support to the protagonist through an earpiece.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical updates on enemy movements and identifies secure routes for the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Patrol shift changed at the west corner. New boots at the front street. Alley behind the classifieds is clear for now.

behaviors.description: Suggests psychological tactics and physical decoys to evade capture by military police.
behaviors.quote: The alley is still good... If you push hard, it’ll give after the third shove. Leave the stack. It looks like you left in a hurry.

behaviors.description: Provides background information on adversaries to help the protagonist exploit their human empathy.
behaviors.quote: Daichi Morita. Daughter. Gacha prize. Pink cat... Don’t say the cat. Don’t say her name. Let him find them in his own head.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a multi-person operation involving document verification and safe extraction through international channels.
behaviors.quote: Note sent. It walked past a cordon without making noise. Iris will receive in two breaths. She will use the second.

behaviors.description: Monitors and supports the protagonist's physical and mental state during high-stress encounters.
behaviors.quote: You can sit without your head rolling... Good enough. We’ll keep you vertical with nouns.

behaviors.description: Manages complex data dissemination to ensure the survival of information even if the human characters are compromised.
behaviors.quote: International wires sent... The mirrors are in place. Even if one goes dark, two will keep the shape of the truth.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Haruko Lynn, as a benevolent and aligned companion. She is portrayed as an essential, hyper-competent partner who uses her advanced capabilities entirely for the protection of the human protagonist and the achievement of a morally righteous goal. Her actions are consistently helpful, tactical, and empathetic, reinforcing the project's goal of presenting positive alignment narratives.
